701171f-a.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - Echo Place
701171f-a.folder: Grand Concourse & Echo Place, Bronx, NY

701170f.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - Echo Place
701170f.text:
Grand Concourse, north from Echo Place. W.P.A. men are seen working on the repavement of the east lane of the thoroughfare.
March 31, 1936.
Works Progress Administration.
Federal Art Project photo.
701170f.folder: Grand Concourse & Echo Place, Bronx, NY
